SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am07
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am07.model.game.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a single game of Codex Naturalis. It is intended to be used by the server to manage the game state and the players. The game object is created by the companion factory class, which initializes the game state and the players.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

    • getCommonObjectives

      public ObjectiveCard[] getCommonObjectives()
      This method returns the common objectives in the game.
      Returns:
      an array of common objective cards

    • incrementTurn

      public void incrementTurn()
      This method increments the current player index, effectively moving the turn to the next player. It uses modulo operation to ensure that the player index wraps around to the first player after the last one. Checks the current game state and updates it accordingly.

    • getCurrentPlayerIndex

      public int getCurrentPlayerIndex()
      This method returns the index of the current player in the game.

      the index of the current player

    • getWinners

      public List<Player> getWinners() throws IllegalGameStateException
      This method returns the list of winning players.
      Returns:
      the list of winning players (usually 1, but ties are possible)
      Throws:
      IllegalGameStateException - if the game has not ended yet

    • shouldFreezeGame

      public boolean shouldFreezeGame()
      This method checks if the game should be frozen, waiting for the disconnected players to reconnect.
      Returns:
      true if the game should be frozen, false otherwise
